newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy bond futures spiral up in never-ending rally.
newsitem.headline: Italy bond futures spiral up in never-ending rally.

text.p: 1510 GMT - Italian debt markets proving inexhaustible with yet another healthy set of gains and a couple of records clocked up in the course of today's trade. Spread over Germany hit 111 bps at close, latest record, as EMU convergence trade continues to drive market. * Bonds:Feb07 +70 bps at 100.40, yield 6.79 pct, spread at record 111bps in closing moments.
* Futures:Sep LIF +60bps at 134.60, which is fresh record.
* Lira:975.70/5.90 per mark, firmer than 977 area earlier.
